body_html: @albanD Thanks for your suggestions! I guess my situation was further complicated by a recent issue on the GPU machine that hosts several GPU cards. After explicitly setting CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES and removing such lines within python did help solve the issue with v0.2.0. No luck with torch.cuda.set_device(dev_id) though.
